channel.title: StarCraft 1 Campaign recreated in SCII
channel.description:
Just found this and thought it sounded interesting:
[url='https://www.sc2mapster.com/maps/sc1-episode-1-rebel-yell/?page=2#comments']SC1 Episode 1 - Rebel Yell Mod[/url] [url='https://www.sc2mapster.com/maps/sc1-episode-1-rebel-yell/files/1-rebel-yell-v1-0/']SC1 Episode 1 - Rebel Yell Map pack[/url]
This mod released 6 days ago for SC2 recreates the entire SC1 terran campaign in SC2. Apparently it has SC1 music, dialogue, and custom models. I can't test it yet because i gotta find my bnet password, tell me what you guys think if you do.

item.title: StarCraft 1 Campaign recreated in SCII

item.description:
Bloodshot:

lol wtf, they used episode 2 music in the 4th mission.

been playing it, its pretty good so far.

I just wanna mention that I love your sig in a non-robosexual kinda way.

item.title: StarCraft 1 Campaign recreated in SCII
item.dc:creator: Merode
item.description:
OrderOfDagon:

Yeah, I’m installing now. I have been waiting for someone to do this. Funny how it takes a random guy to make a remake of Starcraft in about 5 months and it takes these guys 5 years, aha aha. JK
In all seriousness Black mesa is understandably harder and better – I get it; I was joking.

First: It’s just Terran Campaign. Second: The quality is poor comapred to Blizzard’s. He should really POLISH it a lot more…

Read full topic

item.title: StarCraft 1 Campaign recreated in SCII
item.dc:creator: OrderOfDagon
item.description:
Sorry for the double post, but BloodShot, you do not need to have your account and password to play. All you have to do is drag the map you want to play onto your Starcraft 2 icon shortcut. Then it will load the map.
I repeat you do NOT need to login.
Make sure you put the mod into the mod folder in Starcraft and the map in the maps section then drag it onto the icon. That easy.

Read full topic

It’s amazing how just having those original songs in makes the game seem so different during play.
